page.title: 03MY NEIGHBOURHOOD.
page.content: My road is boring,there is no where to play.I like the house we are living in but the road is so small.I wish the field was still open at the top so we can play on the bars and if we weren't in the road my sister would know where to find me.We play in the road but on a night when the cars return it is full and there is no where to play. There are some naggy people in our road and people tell us to go and play up our own end and get away from their car.There is a lady called Jenny and one time when Vicki fell off her bike out side of her house she said,"Stop staring at me I havent got four wheels," and we weren't looking at her.
